title: BrucePac Recalls Ready-To-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: Oct. 9, 2024 - Details of this recall were updated to include the product list of items with a best by date from 6/19/25-10/8/25. WASHINGTON, Oct. 9, 2024 – BrucePac, a Durant, Okla. establishment, is recalling approximately 9,986,245 pounds of ready-to-eat (RTE) meat...

establishment.name: BrucePac
activities: Certification - Export;  Meat Processing;  Poultry Processing
